name: Mobility Routines
description: Improving joint mobility and movement efficiency through controlled exercises.

cards.title: Joint Circles for Full-Body Mobility
cards.description: Performing controlled joint rotations to improve range of motion.
bulletpoints: Rotate ankles, wrists, shoulders, and hips in controlled movements
Focus on slow, deliberate motion to prevent injury
Perform daily to maintain flexibility and joint health

cards.title: Spinal Twists for Back Mobility
cards.description: Loosening up the spine and improving rotational movement.
bulletpoints: Sit or lie down and twist gently to one side
Engage the core for controlled movement
Hold for 15-30 seconds and switch sides
